channel.title: [PI] IP in Char File [PI]
channel.description: I need help with adding the IP into a PI character file me and my friend want to know well thanks for all that help!

item.title: [PI] IP in Char File [PI]
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:


That is the variable in the Player class that holds the players IP address. 

Since you've shown no prior attempts at trying to get this to work, I'm not going to help you any further. This is the Server [b]HELP[/b] section, not the Server "Give me all the code I want" section. Also, adding a variable to the save file in Project Insanity is extremely simple, but it wouldn't surprise me if you haven't even looked in the PlayerSave class yet. I suggest you read this post: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,331370.0.html and this one: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,267609.0.html

That is the variable in the Player class that holds the players IP address.

Since you’ve shown no prior attempts at trying to get this to work, I’m not going to help you any further. This is the Server HELP section, not the Server “Give me all the code I want” section. Also, adding a variable to the save file in Project Insanity is extremely simple, but it wouldn’t surprise me if you haven’t even looked in the PlayerSave class yet. I suggest you read this post: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,331370.0.html and this one: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,267609.0.html
